price: 104. Le feu fouettera leurs visages et ils en auront les lèvres crispées.
arabic: تَلۡفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا كَٰلِحُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: talfaḥu wujūhahumu al-nāru wahum fīhā kāliḥūna
